participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, always looking for ways to express myself through music and sports.
participant_1.background: I am trying to find a sport that will help me improve my physical and mental strength. I am trying to play in a local band. My favorite french fries are from McDonald's. I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs. I am in college.

participant_2.name: Lily Chen
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, I love blending my cultural heritage with my passion for gaming and animation.
participant_2.background: I'm a gamer who enjoys wearing comfortable clothing. I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage. Someday I wish to become a famous animator and work for a big company like Dreamworks. Soccer is my favorite sport, but playing it in the cold weather can be rough. I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, I'm also an avid soccer player. What about you?
I'm trying to find a sport that will help me improve my physical and mental strength. I also like to play guitar and write songs.
That's cool! I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs too. What's your favorite genre to play?
I like to play a lot of different genres, but I really love playing blues and rock.
Me too! I also like to play some rap and hip hop.
That's cool! Do you have any favorite artists?
I love Chance the Rapper, Kendrick Lamar, and J. Cole.
Those are all great artists! I love their music too.
What do you think about the new Dreamworks movie, Abominable?
I thought it was great! The animation was beautiful and the story was really touching.
I agree! I thought the animation was some of the best I've seen in a while.
Yeah, it was really impressive. I'm glad you liked it too!
